title: How to Get Stronger Nails Using Petroleum Jelly

steps.title: Wash your hands.
steps.content: Wash your hands. Not just rinse, actually wash them. This is the first step to the road of stronger nails. [2] X Expert Source Marta Nagorska Nail Artist Expert Interview. 29 July 2019.

steps.title: Don't skimp on the petroleum jelly!
steps.content: Don't skimp on the petroleum jelly! Put a big ol' glob on all your nails!

steps.title: Rub, rub, rub!
steps.content: Rub, rub, rub! Use your index finger to rub all that petroleum jelly around. Pay special attention to these areas: Cuticles, and where you find those pesky hangnails! [3] X Expert Source Marta Nagorska Nail Artist Expert Interview. 29 July 2019.

steps.title: Leave on for 3-5 minutes.
steps.content: Leave on for 3-5 minutes. This leaves time to let the petroleum jelly soak in and gets its full strengthening power!

steps.title: Rinse.
steps.content: Rinse. Make sure you get ALL of the petroleum jelly off.
